title: The White House Gets Witty In Video To Hawk Obamacare
teaser: President Obama is wielding a selfie-stick and flogging Obamacare in a new video that's gone viral. Host Indira Lakshmanan speaks with NPR's Tamara Keith about the week that was at the White House.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
